channel.title: Wtf happen to my amrs?

item.title: Wtf happen to my amrs?
item.dc:creator: @tooky tooky
item.description:
@tooky wrote:

hi, im using a renamed client, and i added some item. But some platebody are fucking the arms of the char. i got some pick and code to show.
(it only make this to Armady chest, bandos chest and fighter.)

[QUOTE]if(i == 11724) {
itemDef.name = “Bandos chestplate”;
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.actions[4] = “Drop”;
itemDef.modelID = 28133;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 27732;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 27753;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 27748;
itemDef.team = 0;
itemDef.stackable = false;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 6;
itemDef.modelZoom = 984;
itemDef.value = 265000;
itemDef.maleEquip2 = 27748;
itemDef.femaleEquip2 = 27759;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 1;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4;
itemDef.certID = 11725;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 501;
itemDef.description = “It’s a Bandos chestplate.”.getBytes();
}[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]if(i == 11720)
{
itemDef.actions = new String[5];

}[/QUOTE]
